Question: May Mobility CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
May Mobility

Product 1

- May Mobility will showcase its autonomous vehicle equipped with the Multi-Policy Decision Making (MPDM) system at CES 2024.
- The MPDM system has delivered over 350,000 autonomy-enabled rides in public transit applications.
- CEO Edwin Olson will speak at CES 2024 on panels discussing the transformative potential of autonomous vehicles in remote communities and making autonomous technologies more accessible and integrated into daily lives.
